item.title: Grindr 转向 Anthropic，亚马逊为人工智能僚机功能提供动力
item.description: Grindr Inc.表示，该公司正在使用亚马逊公司和Anthropic公司的人工智能工具为其 "Wingman "产品开发功能，而不是依赖初创公司Ex-human Inc.的聊天机器人。【原文：Grindr Inc. said it’s using artificial intelligence tools from Amazon.com Inc. and Anthropic to develop features for its “Wingman” product, rather than relying on chatbots from startup Ex-human Inc.】

item.title: TWG 参股穆巴达拉资本，承诺出资 25 亿美元
item.description: 由古根海姆合伙人公司（Guggenheim Partners）创始人马克-沃尔特（Mark Walter）和金融家托马斯-图尔（Thomas Tull —）领导的投资公司 TWG Global 正在入股穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment Co.【原文：TWG Global - the investment firm led by Guggenheim Partners founder Mark Walter and financier Thomas Tull — is taking a stake in Mubadala Investment Co.’s asset management subsidiary as part of a multi-billion dollar collaboration.】

item.title: 特朗普挑起紧张局势，欧盟将放弃对美国技术的依赖
item.description: 欧盟将承认自己无法摆脱美国科技巨头的控制，此举可能会缓和与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易争端。【原文：The European Union is set to concede it can’t break free from the power of US technology giants, in a move that could de-escalate a trade row with President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 马德里竞技与卢旺达合作，与刚果的恩怨逐渐升温
item.description: 卢旺达与西班牙马德里竞技足球俱乐部签署了为期三年的商业合作协议，以推广其 "访问卢旺达"（Visit Rwanda）品牌。【原文：Rwanda signed a three-year commercial partnership with Spanish football club Atletico Madrid to promote its Visit Rwanda brand amid criticism of the country’s role in a conflict in neighboring Democratic Republic of Congo.】

item.title: 进口激增导致美国经济自 2022 年以来首次萎缩
item.description: 美国经济自 2022 年以来首次在年初出现萎缩，原因是关税前进口激增，消费者支出疲软，这是唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易政策所产生的连锁反应的第一个缩影。【原文：The US economy contracted at the start of the year for the first time since 2022 on a monumental pre-tariffs import surge and softer consumer spending, a first snapshot of the ripple effects from President Donald Trump’s trade policy.】

item.title: 加拿大经济发展缓慢，可能无法实现第一季度预期目标
item.description: 加拿大经济因关税不确定性而受到的冲击似乎比预期的要大，2 月份经济萎缩，3 月份经济略有增长。【原文：The Canadian economy appears to be taking a bigger hit from tariff uncertainty than expected, contracting in February and eking out slight growth in March.】

item.title: 美国维持长期债务销售指引，可能加强回购力度
item.description: 美国财政部仍坚持至少在 "几个季度 "内保持较长期限国债发行量不变的指导原则，并表示可能会加强回购旧债的计划。【原文：The US Treasury retained its guidance on keeping the issuance of longer-dated Treasuries unchanged for at least “several quarters,” and indicated that it may beef up its program of buying back older debt.】

item.title: Citadel Securities 警告 SEC：私人房间和 24 小时交易是新出现的风险
item.description: Citadel Securities 正在敦促美国证券交易委员会的新领导层审查一系列其认为正在出现且日益加剧的风险，包括所谓的私人交易室的不透明交易以及美国股市推动全天候运作。【原文：Citadel Securities is urging the Securities and Exchange Commission’s new leadership to examine a list of what it argues are emerging and mounting risks, including opaque trading in so-called private rooms and the push by US stock markets to operate around the clock.】

item.title: ADP 数据显示美国企业新增 6.2 万个就业岗位，创 7 月以来最小增幅
item.description: 4 月份，美国公司的招聘速度放缓至 9 个月来最慢，表明在经济不确定的情况下，对工人的需求减弱。【原文：Hiring at US companies moderated in April to the slowest pace in nine months, indicating waning demand for workers amid economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 欧洲央行调查显示：欧洲消费者准备放弃美国产品
item.description: 欧洲中央银行的研究表明，由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战，欧洲消费者准备主动远离美国的产品和服务。【原文：European consumers are prepared to actively move away from US products and services as a result of President Donald Trump’s trade war, according to research by the European Central Bank.】

item.title: 墨西哥经济在特朗普贸易混乱中勉强躲过衰退
item.description: 墨西哥经济在第一季度略有增长，这使得总统克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）在领导国家应对不可预测的美国关税政策时避免了经济衰退。【原文：Mexico’s economy posted a slight expansion in the first quarter, allowing President Claudia Sheinbaum to avoid recession as she steers the nation through an unpredictable US tariff policy.】

item.title: 最高法院案件对特许学校资金的未来至关重要
item.description: 美国最高法院的一场高风险冲突有可能颠覆美国的特许学校制度，并使本已充满挑战的投资领域更加紧张。【原文：A high-stakes clash at the US Supreme Court threatens to upend the nation’s charter-school system and further strain an already challenged investment arena.】

item.title: 德国通胀降至七个月低点，支持欧洲央行进一步减息
item.description: 德国通胀放缓至七个月来的最低水平，为欧洲中央银行在美国关税不确定性的背景下权衡进一步降息提供了保证。【原文：German inflation slowed to the lowest level in seven months, offering assurance to the European Central Bank as it weighs further interest-rate cuts amid US tariff uncertainty.】

item.title: 美国关税生效，中国新房销售持续低迷
item.description: 由于与美国的贸易紧张局势加剧，中国 4 月份的住宅销售持续疲软，这凸显出政府需要加大力度振兴住房需求和消费。【原文：China’s residential property sales stayed weak in April, underscoring the need for authorities to boost efforts to revive housing demand and consumption as trade tensions with the US rise.】

item.title: 新西兰房价连续第四个月攀升
item.description: 新西兰房价连续第四个月攀升，表明随着利率下降，房地产市场正在温和复苏。【原文：New Zealand house prices climbed for a fourth straight month, signaling a modest recovery is under way in the property market as interest rates fall.】

item.title: 米莱解除货币管制后阿根廷人购买美元
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）在实行了五年的严格货币管制后，允许阿根廷储蓄者完全自由地购买美元。【原文：Argentine savers are going back to the bank to buy dollars after President Javier Milei granted them complete freedom to do so after five years of strict currency controls, at a time when many view the greenback as cheap.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利为百万富翁提供私募股权基金
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）正在为其迄今为止最广泛的受众（即拥有几百万美元的投资者）推出私募股权投资基金，因为资产管理公司正在帮助更广泛的大众进入这个曾经的专属领域。【原文：Morgan Stanley is launching a private equity fund for its widest audience yet — investors wielding a few million dollars — as asset managers help broader masses into the once-exclusive realm.】

item.title: 英国杂货商合作社遭遇黑客攻击，部分系统被关闭
item.description: 英国连锁超市 Co-op 称，它是黑客企图攻击的目标，而就在几天前，马莎集团（Marks & Spencer Group Plc）称，它遭遇了一起网络事件，导致该零售商的部分系统无法访问。【原文：British supermarket chain Co-op said it was the target of a hack attempt, just days after Marks & Spencer Group Plc said it suffered a cyber incident that rendered some of the retailer’s systems inaccessible.】

item.title: 德国将某些地点的天然气储存目标降至 45
item.description: 德国将把某些类型的天然气储存设施在 11 月 1 日前必须储存的天然气数量目标减半至 45%，其中包括位于雷登的德国最大的天然气储存设施。【原文：Germany will halve targets for how much gas has to be stockpiled by Nov. 1 to 45% for certain types of storage facilities — including the country’s largest in Rehden.】

item.title: 在特朗普的关税政策开始实施之前，大石油公司的利润就已受到冲击
item.description:
随着宏观环境的疲软，第一季度业绩不佳可能是来年的一个先兆。【原文：

With the macro environment weakening, flagging first-quarter results may be a harbinger of the year to come.

】

item.title: Prada 在奢侈品销售放缓的大背景下实现进一步增长
item.description: 普拉达公司（Prada SpA）公布的今年年初销售额好于预期，与整个奢侈品行业的疲软态势背道而驰，因为该意大利时尚集团旗下的 Miu Miu 品牌增长迅猛。【原文：Prada SpA reported better-than-expected sales for the start of the year, bucking the weakness across the wider luxury industry as growth soared at the Italian fashion group’s Miu Miu brand.】

item.title: 马塞洛-克劳尔扩展投资帝国，打造 Brightstar
item.description: 马塞洛-克劳尔（Marcelo Claure）是一位企业家和投资家，曾领导过软银集团公司（SoftBank Group Corp.【原文：Marcelo Claure, the entrepreneur and investor who previously steered SoftBank Group Corp.’s operations, is joining private equity firm Brightstar Capital Partners in a bid to extend its middle-market reach.】

item.title: 外国游客对毛里求斯豪华房地产的需求激增
item.description: 毛里求斯是一个印度洋岛国，以绵长的白沙滩、蔚蓝的泻湖以及无资本利得税和遗产税而闻名，外国对毛里求斯豪宅的需求有增无减。【原文：Foreign demand for luxury properties continues unabated in Mauritius, an Indian Ocean island nation known for its long stretches of white-sand beaches, blue lagoons and an absence of capital gains and inheritance taxes.】

item.title: 特朗普的新港口费对中国航运和世界贸易意味着什么？
item.description: 美国计划开始向停靠其港口的中国大型船只收取数百万美元的费用，这加深了世界两大经济体之间的贸易战。【原文：The US plans to start charging large Chinese ships millions of dollars to call at its ports, deepening the trade war between the world’s two largest economies.】

item.title: 特拉维斯-卡兰尼克的云厨探索中东部门的首次公开募股
item.description: 云厨（CloudKitchens）是优步（Uber Technologies Inc.据熟知内情的人士透露，优步公司前首席执行官特拉维斯-卡兰尼克（Travis Kalanick）经营的初创公司 CloudKitchens 正在探索对其中东业务进行首次公开募股。【原文：CloudKitchens, a startup run by former Uber Technologies Inc. Chief Executive Officer Travis Kalanick, is exploring an initial public offering of its Middle East operations, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: DoorDash 竞购 Deliveroo 标志着欧洲送餐热潮的结束
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，我们的每日时事通讯由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，孙亚洲将解读 DoorDash 收购 Deliveroo 的提议对这个从高位重挫的行业意味着什么。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Yazhou Sun unpacks what DoorDash’s offer to buy Deliveroo means for an industry that’s fallen hard from its pandemic highs.】

item.title: 普通手推车如何为特朗普的关税战提供借鉴
item.description: 一位历史学家在 YouTube 上解释说，独轮车最早的历史证据出现在大约 2000 年前的中国，又过了 12 个世纪，这种单轮推车才出现在欧洲。【原文：The earliest historical evidence of wheelbarrows appears in China about 2,000 years ago, a historian explains on YouTube, and it took another 12 centuries before these single-wheeled pushcarts appeared in Europe.】

item.title: 科技公司首席执行官与立法者共聚国家安全峰会
item.description: 硅谷在华盛顿日益增长的影响力将在本周三得到充分展示，届时科技巨头和风险投资家将与美国最高级别的立法者齐聚一堂，参加一场聚焦尖端技术如何促进国家安全和美国制造业的峰会。【原文：Silicon Valley’s growing influence in Washington will be on full display Wednesday as tech titans and venture capitalists gather with top US lawmakers for a summit focused on how cutting-edge technologies can bolster national security and American manufacturing.】

item.title: 危机领导者卡尼现在着手挽救加拿大经济增长
item.description: 我是兰迪-桑通-奈特（Randy Thanthong-Knight），驻渥太华的加拿大经济和政府问题记者。今天我们关注全国大选对经济政策的影响。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您尚未注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击此处。【原文：I’m Randy Thanthong-Knight, a reporter on Canada’s economy and government in Ottawa. Today we’re looking at the economic-policy implications of the national election. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 五月抛售 "威胁到 S&P 500 指数的反弹走势
item.description:
最著名的市场趋势之一是由数十年的历史业绩所支撑的。【原文：

One of the best-known market trends is backed by decades of historical performance. 

】
